name: Descent (shtobar, Shogun)
description:
Delve into the hole full of wonders and dangers. At the bottom a magnificent treasure awaits. Beware of corridors full of monsters and traps, only the bravest might reach the depth of this great adventure.

Team:
  • Shogun - Graphics and level design
  • Shtobar - Programming
Used Resources:

DDRKirby(ISQ) - Music

  • Crystal Fall - Life Is a Journey
  • Mossy Fungi - Zodiac Procession
  • Rocky Passage - Afterglow (OHC Version)
  • Forgotten Ruins- Ataraxis

Evan King - Sound effects

  • Sounds from Album 20XX

Hewett Tsoi - Font 

  • Font used in game: Alagard
Controls:
  • Move: Arrow keys
  • Jump/Glide: Space
  • Pause: Enter or Escape

Gamepad supported
